alert.note: Alert for Dorchester; Somerset; Wicomico; Worcester (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued July 25 at 6:16PM EDT until July 25 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 503 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 10 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN MARYLAND THIS WATCH INCLUDES 4 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST MARYLAND DORCHESTER SOMERSET WICOMICO WORCESTER IN VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 9 COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL VIRGINIA ESSEX KING WILLIAM KING AND QUEEN RICHMOND WESTMORELAND IN EASTERN VIRGINIA LANCASTER MIDDLESEX NORTHUMBERLAND IN SOUTHEAST VIRGINIA ACCOMACK THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF BRAYS FORK, CAMBRIDGE, CARET, CENTER CROSS, CHAMPLAIN, CHINCOTEAGUE, CLANCIE, COLONIAL BEACH, CRISFIELD, DRAGONVILLE, DUNBROOKE, DUNNSVILLE, GREENBACKVILLE, GRESSIT, HORNTOWN, HOWERTONS, KILMARNOCK, KING AND QUEEN COURT HOUSE, LANCASTER, LEWISETTA, LITTLE PLYMOUTH, MASCOT, MATTAPONI, NEW CHURCH, OCEAN CITY, ONANCOCK, PRINCESS ANNE, SALISBURY, URBANNA, WARSAW, AND WEST POINT.
